context: Hello! How are you? I'm good. Haha!!
What kind of movies do you like?
I like everything but I am trying to plan a movie night with friends. Can you suggest anything?
Sure. Are you going to the theater or staying home and streaming?
Okay. If you want to see a funny movie, you could see Deadpool (2016) . Then, on another night, go see Deadpool 2 (2018) together.
Oh that sounds like fun. I have seen the first one and I love it.
resp: If you are in the mood to see something that won awards, I loved La La Land (2016) . Great soundtrack, too.
